ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mistmoor Drum Goes Poof
ygData.msgSnippet: that was fixed the first patch after Kunark, has worked fine since.  friend said something in the spdat changed from 66 to 65 (speed % increase maybe?). one
ygData.messageBody:
that was fixed the first patch after Kunark, has worked fine since. friend
said something in the spdat changed from 66 to 65 (speed % increase maybe?).
one thing i noticed is, with song of travel you do not make the goofy
animation when the song pulses, you continue running normally though at the
increased speed from the instrument. i do not know if this is with other
drums (have not tried mm or hand drum) but with selo's i don't glide nor
have a seizure, i just run.

i dropped my drum for the first time tuesday night, i thought it would look
like a bag too but it is a stick. it is also a very common drop off
nagafen, good luck Moonflower!

Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server

> No, seriously. If you try to sing the level 51 travel song
> with a Drum of
> the March the song will behave as if you don't have a drum
> because you're
> exceeding the speed cap. So it plays as if you were just
> singing it (still
> fast but uh....) Fastest drum to use for lvl 51 song is the
> one from Kedge
> ;)
>
> Lyrnia Jongleur
